name: Biochemistry
title: WCAS BIOL_SCI 308-0-20 Biochemistry
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Students who have previously taken and received credit for either BIOL_SCI 301 or BIOL_SCI 309 may not take this course. Students must also have completed Chem 210-1 or 212-1.
